subject: Implement ecosystem synthesis with 3 Opus agents (Phase 3)
description:
Create synthesize_ecosystem.py with 3 parallel Opus agents: Agent A (single-project innovations), Agent B (cross-project synergies), Agent C (package updates for cpb-core/voice-nexus). Load ALL 21 project architectures, dependency graph, package versions, meta-vengine state. Generate ecosystem plan with topological ordering and priority ranking.

Success criteria:
- 8-12 single-project innovations
- 3-5 cross-project synergies
- 1-2 package updates
- Valid dependency-ordered roadmap
- Cost: <$3 (3 Opus agents, optimized context)

Files to create:
- ~/researchgravity/orchestrator/synthesize_ecosystem.py (~700 lines)
